hints.label: thm-continuum-limit-ym
hints.title: Continuum Limit of Discrete Yang-Mills
hints.content:
1163: :label: thm-continuum-limit-ym
1164: 
1165: As lattice parameters $\Delta t, \rho \to 0$ with fixed physical coupling $g_{\text{phys}}$:
1166: 
1167: $$
1168: S_{\text{YM}}^{\text{discrete}} \to S_{\text{YM}}^{\text{continuum}} = \frac{1}{4g_{\text{phys}}^2} \int d^{d+1}x \sum_{a=1}^3 F_{\mu\nu}^{(a)} F^{(a),\mu\nu}
1169: $$
1170: 
1171: **Lattice renormalization**:
1172: 
1173: $$
1174: \frac{1}{g_{\text{phys}}^2} = \frac{1}{g^2} + b_0 \log(\Lambda \tau) + O(g^2)
1175: $$
1176: 
1177: where $b_0 = -11/(48\pi^2)$ for SU(2) (beta function coefficient).

hints.title: Sketch
hints.content:
1182: :::{prf:proof} Sketch
1183: 
1184: **Step 1**: Expand link variables for small $\tau$:
1185: 
1186: $$
1187: U_{ij} = I + i\tau A_e T^a - \frac{\tau^2}{2} A_e^2 (T^a)^2 + O(\tau^3)
1188: $$
1189: 
1190: **Step 2**: Compute plaquette product:
1191: 
1192: $$
1193: U_{\square} = I + i\tau^2 F_{\square}^{(a)} T^a - \frac{\tau^4}{2} (F_{\square}^{(a)})^2 + O(\tau^6)
1194: $$
1195: 
1196: where $F_{\square}^{(a)} = \partial_\mu A_\nu^{(a)} - \partial_\nu A_\mu^{(a)} + g \epsilon^{abc} A_\mu^{(b)} A_\nu^{(c)}$.
1197: 
1198: **Step 3**: Plaquette action:
1199: 
1200: $$
1201: S_{\square} = \frac{\tau^4}{4} \sum_a (F_{\square}^{(a)})^2
1202: $$
1203: 
1204: **Step 4**: Sum over plaquettes with density $N_{\square} \sim V/\tau^{d+1}$:
1205: 
1206: $$
1207: S_{\text{YM}} \to \frac{1}{4g^2} \int d^{d+1}x \sum_a F_{\mu\nu}^{(a)} F^{(a),\mu\nu}
1208: $$
